name: Ant Wars
description:
This is phase I of the ant pheromone experiments. We have developed a chip that when inserted into an ant will allow them to be remote controlled.

You may also place pheromone spots that will draw soldier ants. 

You control the growth of the colony. Will you predominantly add workers, or hard hitting soldier ants?

Watch out for that pesky spider and those hateful red ants!

You win the game when the spider has been killed and the red ants economy crushed!

Controls:

WASD to move your character

Use the buttons in the top right of the screen to spawn worker or soldier ants.

Right click to drop a pheromone trail that nearby soldier ants will be attracted too.

Press ESC to restart the game

If you die, select the worker ants spawn button to re-spawn your character. This will only happen if you have at least 5 food stored up.
